com.freshbourne.io
Interface PageManager<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Subinterfaces:
AutoSaveResourceManager, ResourceManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPageManager, CachedResourceManager, DataPageManager, FileResourceManager
public interface PageManager<T>

None of the methods throw an IOException. It is assumed, that the PageManager has an open Resource to which it can write.

Method Summary
 T createPage()
          creates a new valid Page with a valid id for which space has been reserved in the resource.
 T getPage(int id)
           
 boolean hasPage(int id)
           
 void removePage(int id)
          removes the Page with the given id
 void sync()
          Forces the sync of pages to resources.
 

Method Detail

createPage

T createPage()
creates a new valid Page with a valid id for which space has been reserved in the resource.

Returns:
page

getPage

T getPage(int id)
Parameters:
id - of the page to be fetched
Returns:
page with given id from resource or cache, null if page could not be found

removePage

void removePage(int id)
removes the Page with the given id

Parameters:
id - of the Page to be removed

hasPage

boolean hasPage(int id)
Parameters:
id - of the page
Returns:
true, if the page exists

sync

void sync()
Forces the sync of pages to resources. If the ResouceManager does not cache, this implementation remains empty.
